reference.shortdesc: The titlealts element contains alternate titles, such as a title intended for use in a table of contents or a title specific to search results.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample shows how the titlealts element contains a search title:
example.codeblock: <topic id="programming-example"> <title>Example of required programming</title> <titlealts> <navtitle>Example of programming in XSLT</navtitle> </titlealts> <body> <!-- ... --> </body> </topic>
